titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: I wrote a short sermon for the Church Lads Brigade Service tomorrow. Kirshbaum took me for a short walk, in the course of which I told him of my project for Harold. On the whole he approved. Frank Green called & had tea. He has grown greatly. By some oversight no programmes arrived for the Organ Recital, to Custard's consternation.
